The main control tool for running Falco in Kubernetes, ...

Usage:
  falcoctl
  falcoctl [command]

Available Commands:
  convert     Conversion helpers
  delete      Delete a component with falcoctl
  help        Help about any command
  install     Install a component with falcoctl

Flags:
      --config string   config file path (default $HOME/.falcoctl.yaml if exists)
  -f, --fab             enable rainbow logs
  -h, --help            help for falcoctl
  -v, --verbose int     verbosity 0 (off) 4 (most) (default 3)

Use "falcoctl [command] --help" for more information about a command.
